reviews.comment: The BEST facial i‚Äôve done so far. I tried the microdermabrasion facial and it was aaawesome. For oily and acne prone with dull skin and pollution, this is a literal game changer. Very light but thorough facial that sucked all the dead skinn cells like vacuum cleaner, literally. Their therapist , Tini, is very skill full that made the treatment even more enjoyable. Plus they have an excellent and calming vibe even since you step in to the place. Would very much recommend this place for anyone looking for their facial upgrades. They also do injections and would keen to try as so far price matches with quality.

reviewReply.comment:

It‚Äôs also lovely to hear you felt the calming atmosphere from the moment you arrived; we put a lot of thought into creating that feeling.

(Translated by Google) I had a wonderful experience at Cocoon Medical Spa Canggu, a clean, calm, and welcoming place. The atmosphere is soothing, with minimalist yet warm decor that quickly puts you at ease.

The staff was extremely professional, respectful, and reassuring throughout the process. A big thank you to Kathleen in particular, who guided me well and gently explained each step, allowing me to feel confident and relaxed! reviews.name: accounts/109616517437403268640/locations/5135673551050654657/reviews/Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT205dWJqTTJUVEpuTURVeFdVNDJZbTFaUzNGclpWRRAB

reviews.comment: European prices non transparent Indonesian quality. Also the place stings. Stay safe stay away.

reviewReply.comment:
Dear guest,
Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback, although we must clarify several inaccuracies of facts.

To set the record straight, no treatment was performed during your visit. You attended a free consultation lasting approximately 10 minutes. From the outset, our staff and doctor experienced challenging behavior from you, including a refusal to provide your full name or complete the required medical consultation form‚Äîboth of which are essential for safety and legal compliance.

Our doctor nonetheless proceeded to answer all of your questions professionally and provided detailed information about Botox dosage and treatment options. At no point during the consultation were prices discussed, nor was a quote provided. Therefore, your comments about high pricing are unfounded.

We take pride in offering respectful, high-quality care to all guests, and we welcome constructive feedback. However, misrepresenting events, especially when no treatment occurred, is misleading and unfair to our team. The nature of your behavior and the inaccuracies in your review raise concerns about the intent behind your comments.

For all our guests, we welcome comments that will help us improve our services. However we do not accept reviews that are not honest and behaviour that is not respecful of our staff. 

Sincerely
Cocoon Medical Spa Canggu
